sentence.Network_en: The burglar read: " Presented to Calvin Coolidge, Speaker of the House, by the Massachusetts General Court. "
sentence.Network_cn: 窃贼念道: “ 众议院议长卡尔文-柯立芝惠存, 马萨诸塞州州议会敬赠. ”

sentence.Network_en: Coolidge, knowing there was $ 80 in the billfold, persuaded the intruder to sit down and talk.
sentence.Network_cn: 柯立芝知道钱夹里有八十美元, 便劝不速之客坐下来谈谈.

sentence.Network_en: Coolidge added up the room rate and two rail tickets back to the campus.
sentence.Network_cn: 柯立芝把住宿费和回学校的两张火车票价合计了一下.

list.abs: 美国历任总统 ... 沃伦·哈定( Warren Harding) 卡尔文·柯立芝( Calvin Coolidge) 赫伯特·胡佛( Herbert Hoover).

means.word_mean: 1. elected Vice President and succeeded as 30th President of the United States when Harding died in 1923 (1872-1933)
